text: Ej kasone, ki imon ʙa Alloh ovardaed va amal ʙa sariati Rasuli U dored, cun zanoni ʙo imonro nikoh karded va pes az on ki ʙo onho hamsari kuned, taloqason gufted, sumoro ʙar onho iddae nest, ki sumo hisoʙi iddai onro ʙisumored. Pas, ononro hadjai munosiʙ dihed, to ʙahramand savand va ʙa nekutarin roh ʙa xuʙi rahojason kuned
